synopsis.text: This thrilling anime plunges Team Gun Gun into an unexpected challenge: a survival game with a cosplay twist! Equipped with Yuki's impressive array of cosplay costumes, the team must navigate this unconventional competition while learning to outsmart their opponents. Meanwhile, Hotaru's concern for Tooru leads her to discover a flyer for the air gun tournament TCC. Despite Tooru's initial hesitations, Hotaru manages to rally the entire Toy Gun Gun team to participate in the tournament. Over at Team Hoshishiro, Ichi successfully recruits Nagamasa and Takakora for the TCC, hinting at some secret preparations that could catch some participants off guard. Prepare for a wild ride filled with costumes, camaraderie, and high-stakes competition!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
